prompt: To the left side is a bipartite graph corresponding to an instance of \textsc{Bipartite Crossing Number}. The two orderings $\tau_1$ and $\tau_2$ lead to 3 crossings. To the right side is the corresponding instance of \panelcrossmin\ and the ordering $\sigma$ obtained from $\tau_1$ and $\tau_2$ with 3 forced crossings.
